text: Ye byakti allahara masajidasamuhe tamra nama uccarana karate badha deya ebam seguloke ujara karate cesta kare, tara ca'ite bara yalema ara ke? Edera pakse masajidasamuhe prabesa kara bidheya naya, abasya bhita-santrasta abasthaya. Odera jan'ya ihakale lanchana ebam parakale kathina sasti rayeche.
